m_q.target_metric: Best lag (0-48 hours) between semi-major axis change of SATCAT 43180 and OMNI AP index that maximizes r^2 correlation during May 1-30, 2024
sub_questions: Calculate semi-major axis from TLE data.
Calculate semi-major axis change (delta) between consecutive TLE data points.
Extract AP index from OMNI2 data.
Round TLE epoch times to the nearest hour.
Merge TLE data and OMNI2 data based on rounded epoch time and lag.
Calculate r^2 correlation between semi-major axis change and AP index for each lag (0-48 hours).
Identify the lag with the maximum r^2 correlation.

schema_conflicts: Column names in omni2_2024.dat are not descriptive.
omni2.text provides format specification for omni2_2024.dat

scale_issues: Mean motion needs to be converted to radians per second for semi-major axis calculation.

format_notes: omni2_2024.dat is a comma separated file.
omni2.text is a comma separated file.

constraints: Lag must be an integer between 0 and 48 (inclusive).
TLE data must be converted to semi-major axis (a) using mu and mean_motion: a = (mu / mean_motion^2)^(1/3), where mu = 398600.4418 km^3/s^2
derived_filters: Epoch time rounded to the nearest hour.
Semi-major axis change (delta) between consecutive TLE data points.
statistical_tests: Pearson correlation coefficient (r) between semi-major axis change and AP index.
output_format_requirements: Report the lag (in hours) with the highest r^2 correlation.

raw_text:
```json
{
  "M_Q": {
    "target_metric": "Best lag (0-48 hours) between semi-major axis change of SATCAT 43180 and OMNI AP index that maximizes r^2 correlation during May 1-30, 2024",
    "filters": [
      "TLE data within May 1-30, 2024",
      "OMNI2 data within May 1-30, 2024"
    ],
    "grouping_variables": [],
    "output_cardinality": "scalar",
    "sub_questions": [
      "Calculate semi-major axis from TLE data.",
      "Calculate semi-major axis change (delta) between consecutive TLE data points.",
      "Extract AP index from OMNI2 data.",
      "Round TLE epoch times to the nearest hour.",
      "Merge TLE data and OMNI2 data based on rounded epoch time and lag.",
      "Calculate r^2 correlation between semi-major axis change and AP index for each lag (0-48 hours).",
      "Identify the lag with the maximum r^2 correlation."
    ]
  },
  "M_S": {
    "sources": [
      "43180.tle",
      "omni2_2024.dat",
      "omni2.text"
    ],
    "join_keys": [
      {
        "left_source": "43180.tle",
        "right_source": "omni2_2024.dat",
        "left_column": "epoch_time_rounded",
        "right_column": "omni_time",
        "join_type": "inner"
      }
    ],
    "schema_conflicts": [
      "Column names in omni2_2024.dat are not descriptive.",
      "omni2.text provides format specification for omni2_2024.dat"
    ],
    "column_mappings": {
      "2024": "year",
      "1": "month",
      "0": "day",
      "2596": "hour",
      "55": "ap_index"
    }
  },
  "M_U": {
    "unit_annotations": {
      "inclination": "degrees",
      "raan": "degrees",
      "eccentricity": "unitless",
      "arg_perigee": "degrees",
      "mean_anomaly": "degrees",
      "mean_motion": "revolutions per day",
      "ap_index": "unitless"
    },
    "scale_issues": [
      "Mean motion needs to be converted to radians per second for semi-major axis calculation.",
      "Semi-major axis is in km."
    ],
    "cross_source_conflicts": []
  },
  "M_F": {
    "has_header": true,
    "delimiter": ",",
    "encoding": "utf-8",
    "sentinel_values": [
      "NA",
      "N/A",
      "",
      "999999.99",
      "99999.99.1",
      "99999.99.2",
      "99999.99.3",
      "99999.99.4",
      "999.9"
    ],
    "expected_columns": 12,
    "file_format": "csv",
    "format_notes": [
      "43180.tle is a comma separated file.",
      "omni2_2024.dat is a comma separated file.",
      "omni2.text is a comma separated file."
    ]
  },
  "M_C": {
    "constraints": [
      "Lag must be an integer between 0 and 48 (inclusive).",
      "TLE data must be converted to semi-major axis (a) using mu and mean_motion: a = (mu / mean_motion^2)^(1/3), where mu = 398600.4418 km^3/s^2"
    ],
    "derived_filters": [
      "Epoch time rounded to the nearest hour.",
      "Semi-major axis change (delta) between consecutive TLE data points."
    ],
    "statistical_tests": [
      "Pearson correlation coefficient (r) between semi-major axis change and AP index.",
      "R-squared (r^2) calculation."
    ],
    "output_format_requirements": [
      "Report the lag (in hours) with the highest r^2 correlation.",
      "Report the maximum r^2 value."
    ]
  }
}
```
